attr.desc: You are a homeless extraterrestrial living in a futuristic version of Japan. Humans are nearly extinct and Earth is a cesspool of pollution, urban decay, and economic inequality. Struggle to survive in this new style of RPG.
attr.desc_md:
You are a homeless extraterrestrial living in a futuristic version of Japan. Humans are nearly extinct and Earth is a cesspool of pollution, urban decay, and economic inequality. Struggle to survive in this new style of RPG.

Key Features:

- Choose from 3 alien species. All of them are weird aliens with cool abilities.
- Romance and befriend over 20 characters including a gangster, a breakdancer, a priest, a giant ooze, and a robot serial killer.
- Gain one of 5 pets, each with different abilities and unique personalities.
- Grow your physical, mental, and social stats, and use them to overcome obstacles.
- Do what it takes to survive. Forage, fight, fish, steal, salvage, sneak, shop, beg, get a job, sell your organs, party, get high, gamble, mutate, use psychic powers. - There are many paths to success.
- Be a good person or a scoundrel. The karma system tracks it all.
- Dozens of endings and achievements.
- Evocative descriptions bring the dystopian world to life. It's a really terrible place!
attr.inst: Download any version of the game from Steam or [Itch.io](https://willyelektrix.itch.io/alien-squatter), extract the zip file and copy the asquatter.rpg file into the the  aliensquatter port folder.
attr.inst_md: Download any version of the game from [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/1131750/Alien_Squatter/) or itch.io, extract the zip file and copy the asquatter.rpg file into the the  aliensquatter port folder.
attr.title: Alien Squatter

attr.desc: Welcome to a compact, tightly packed Metroidvania, where the Square Aspect Ratio and Single Screen Level Design allows every one of the 200+ rooms to slot into the larger puzzle-box of the world; where secrets, exploits and sequence-breaking are built into the very foundation of the game; and where the overarching story doesn’t care too much which path you happen to take through the game.
attr.inst: Purchase the game on Steam and copy game files into the assets folder.

attr.desc:
Annalynn is a 2D platformer made in the style of arcade games from the early '80s. Play as Annalynn, the eponymous heroine who has to run, jump, and climb to outwit the four snakes: Randy, Handy, Candy, and Mike. Collect the coins, grab the bonus foods, and turn the tables with blinding rubies! Think you've got what it takes to go for the high score?

attr.desc_md: As the world burns, as the streets crumble, you cling to one thing: **Survival.** An unstoppable alien blight has taken hold of the earth, and there's no fighting it. **Escape** is the **only option**. Run, jump, and slide your way through urban destruction in this intense runner!

attr.desc:
Apricots has nothing to do with apricots. It's a game where you fly a little plane around the screen and shoot things and drop bombs on enemy targets, and it's meant to be quick and fun.

Big thanks to [Moggers87](https://github.com/moggers87/apricots) for producing this game. 

The [source](https://github.com/moggers87/apricots)
attr.inst:
At present there is no option screen. Options can be changed by editing the configuration file apricots.cfg. This is first searched for in ~/.config/apricots/, then the system configuration directory (usually /usr/local/etc or /etc) and finally the default configuration in the data directory.

The number and type of planes can be varied, along with the airbases, as can 1/2 player game be chosen. The number of anti aircraft guns and scenery can be selected. Draks can be turned on or off, and a different condition for winning the game can be chosen.
attr.title: Apricots

attr.desc: Fast-paced omni-directional arena shooter.
attr.inst:
Clear a scene by destroying all the enemies that are in the scene.
If you touch an enemy body or enemy bullet, you loose a life.
When you clear 10 scenes, you proceed to the next area.
The game is complete when five areas are cleared.
If all areas can't be cleared in the time limit, it's game over.
attr.title: AREA2048

attr.desc:
BOOTLEG BOX is a retro pastiche of bootleg NES/Famicom multicarts and unlicensed games - featuring:

ULTRA PADDLES
CYBER ATTACK
CHOMP'S PUZZLE
NUCLEAR CODES
EGGSELENT

These small games are designed to feel retro-yet-smooth, with streamlined controls, and colourful, sometimes toy-like art. Difficulty ramps up over time. Best suited to killing time during lunch breaks or something, idk.

Everything should be pretty well optimised, and each game responds to the same control scheme as outlined in the main menu.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.desc: Bos Wars is a futuristic real time strategy game (RTS). In a RTS game, the player has to combat his enemies while developing his war economy. Everything runs in real-time, as opposed to turn-based games where the player always has to wait for his turn. The trick is to balance the effort put into building his economy and building an army to defend and attack the enemies.

in  a  networked  environment.   There are five teams:  red, green, blue, purple and rogue
(rogue tanks are black).  Destroying a player on another team scores a  win,  while  being
destroyed  or  destroying  a  teammate  scores a loss.  Rogues have no teammates (not even
other rogues), so they cannot shoot teammates and they do not have a team score.

attr.desc: CannonBall is an souped up game engine for the OutRun arcade game. The original 68000 and Z80 assembler code has been rewritten in C++. This makes it possible to make improvements suitable for modern platforms, including a higher frame-rate and widescreen support. It requires the original ROMs, as these contain elements including the graphics and audio data.
attr.inst:
Add the OutRun Revision B ROMs into /ports/cannonball/roms folder.
Support for console tracks and newer features
attr.title: Cannonball Standalone

attr.desc:
Carrie's Order Up! is a challenging arcade game inspired by the likes of Pac-Man and Game & Watch. As Carrie, a crab waitress in a port town's restaurant, you have to serve spaghetti, pancakes, and burgers to all kinds of sea creatures without bumping into them!

Mechanics may be simple, but a level of depth to the mechanics exist, with tons of achievements to reward those that learn to master being a crab waitress! If you're looking for a cute and challenging game that lifts inspiration from arcade titles, you'll find hours of entertainment in Carrie's Order Up!

Scavenge the remnants of a dead civilization for food, equipment, or, if you are lucky, a vehicle with a full tank of gas to get you the hell out of Dodge. Fight to defeat or escape from a wide variety of powerful monstrosities, from zombies to giant insects to killer robots and things far stranger and deadlier, and against the others like yourself, that want what you have…

attr.desc: Catacomb II (Renamed to The Catacomb in 1991) contains 30 new levels and a few new monsters in this follow-up to the 1989-1990 release. Petton Everhail is contacted by Terexin, High Wizard of the Kieralon. Terexin informs him the Kieralon Empire has fallen. Petton must travel to the Kieralon Palace to collect the lost treasures of Terexin, who has offerd to split them fifty-fifty. Petton agrees, puts down his cup of Orange Pekoe tea, and marches off for the Catacombs under the Kieralon Palace.
attr.inst: Copy your *.CA2 files into ports/catacomb/ and filenames should be uppercase.  If game files are lowercase, the launcher will attempt to convert them to uppercase automatically.  Both the floppy disk and GOG versions are compatible.
attr.title: Catacomb II

Petton agrees, puts down his cup of Orange Pekoe tea, and marches off for the Catacombs under the Kieralon Palace.

attr.desc: Charge Kid is a game where each jump is a puzzle. You can compare it to Portal, where you have to find clever uses of the mechanics and physics to "solve" each location by reaching the desired location. You have limited resources to make each jump, comparable to Celeste. But instead of focusing on precision-platforming, the game focuses on the puzzle aspect. Unlike Celeste, the hard part is figuring out how to use your resources to make each jump instead of the execution. But don't get fooled; the execution is also hard, which means finding each solution is even harder!
attr.inst: Ready to Run!
attr.inst_md:
If you liked the game, kindly consider supporting the devs at the following:
Itch.io: [https://eldskald.itch.io/charge-kid](https://eldskald.itch.io/charge-kid)
Steam: [https://store.steampowered.com/app/1334300/Charge_Kid/](https://store.steampowered.com/app/1334300/Charge_Kid/)

attr.desc:
Commander Genius is an open-source clone of Commander Keen, originally developed by Id Software.

Play as Billy Blaze, an eight-year-old genius who becomes Commander Keen to save the galaxy! Grab your pogo stick, neural stunner, and blast off in your homemade Megarocket to stop deadly foes and dodge cosmic dangers—or risk becoming space toast!

Includes episodes 1, 4, 6, and Keen Dreams. Supports additional official/community-made content.
attr.desc_md:
[**Commander Genius**](https://gitlab.com/Dringgstein/Commander-Genius) is an open-source clone of [**Commander Keen**](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Commander_Keen), originally developed by [**Id Software**](https://idsoftware.com).

*You are eight-year-old Billy Blaze, boy genius to your neighborhood. Commander Keen to the rest of the universe. It's time to grab your trusty pogo stick and neural stunner, climb into the cockpit of your homemade Megarocket and blast off for adventure. To prevent the obliteration of life as we know it, you'll have to battle your way past deadly hazards and devious creatures, or end up as space toast.*

Supports addition of [official](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Commander_Keen#Titles)/[community-made](https://keenwiki.shikadi.net/wiki/Main_Page) content
attr.inst:
Includes all of the officially released free content for the Commander Keen series, such as, the shareware episodes (1,4), demo episode (6), and the lost episode: Keen Dreams.

You can add additional content to this port manually or, if you have an internet connected device, through the launcher. Please the Portmaster website for more detailed instructions.
attr.inst_md:
Includes all of the **officially released** free content for the [**Commander Keen**](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Commander_Keen) series, such as, the **shareware episodes** ([1](https://keenwiki.shikadi.net/wiki/Keen_1:_Marooned_on_Mars), [4](https://keenwiki.shikadi.net/wiki/Keen_4:_Secret_of_the_Oracle)), the **demo episode** ([6](https://keenwiki.shikadi.net/wiki/Keen_6:_Aliens_Ate_My_Baby_Sitter!)), and the **lost episode**: [Keen Dreams](https://keenwiki.shikadi.net/wiki/Keen_Dreams).

You can add additional content to this port manually (check `gamedata/instructions.txt`) or, if you have an internet connected device, directly through the launcher itself (button is bottom-left).
attr.title: Commander Genius

attr.desc: One of the few hardcore restaurant sims in existence, Cook, Serve, Delicious! is a deceptively easy game to learn but incredibly challenging to master as you progress through your career from owning a terrible zero star cafe into a five star world famous restaurant.

attr.desc:
Your ship has been pulled into an interdimensional gap and is now trapped within a field of crystal orbs.

Match 3 or more orbs to destroy them. Mix primary colors to get a secondary color, or secondary colors to get a silver orb!

Silver orbs will give you special powers when you match them.

But be aware that time is your enemy. Don't let the orb wall reach the limit range or your ship will be destroyed.
attr.inst: Ready to Run

attr.desc:
Play as a mercenary sent into planetary mines to destroy them before a computer virus spreads! You'll fly through 3D mazes in search of keycards to gain access to each level's reactor--which, once destroyed, will begin a self-destruct! Make sure you know where the exit hatch is! It will only open when the reactor is destroyed. Oh, and watch out for those virus-infected robots. They'll shoot at you.

Includes shareware/demo files. See instructions to use full version.
attr.inst: Ready to play with shareware and demo files. To upgrade to full game, purchase on Steam/GOG and then add .hog and .pig files to ports/descent/data.

attr.desc:
Return as a mercenary sent into deep space mines to destroy them before a computer virus spreads! You'll fly through 3D mazes in search of keycards to gain access to each level's reactor--which, once destroyed, will begin a self-destruct! Make sure you know where the exit hatch is! It will only open when the reactor is destroyed. Oh, and watch out for those virus-infected robots. They'll shoot at you.

Includes shareware/demo files. See instructions to use full version.
attr.inst: Ready to play with shareware and demo files. To upgrade to full game, purchase on Steam/GOG and then add .hog and .pig files to ports/descent2/data. Fully compatible with Descent 2: Vertigo and Descent Maximum levels!

attr.inst: Purchase the full game from GOG or Steam, or use CD game data patched to v1.4. Then, add data files to `descent3/gamedata`. See the readme for specific files needed.

And remember: what kills you only makes you stronger.

The player resumes their role as Doomguy, who must do battle with various hell-spawn.

attr.desc: Doom RPG is a mobile phone game developed by Fountainhead Entertainment . It combines the Doom first-person shooter franchise with role-playing video game elements. The storyline incorporates many similar events of Doom 3, but involves different characters than those in the third game.
attr.inst: Search for Doom RPG BREW on archive.org to get the original mobile game assets file: doomrpg.bar (CRC32: d7cf11c5) and copy the doomrpg.bar file into the gamedata folder.
attr.title: Doom RPG

attr.desc: A fully playable re-implementation of the Cave Story (Doukutsu Monogatari) engine written in Rust.
attr.desc_md:
A fully playable re-implementation of the Cave Story (Doukutsu Monogatari) engine written in Rust.

This port is a build of doukutsu-rs, see:

[https://github.com/doukutsu-rs/doukutsu-rs](https://github.com/doukutsu-rs/doukutsu-rs)

You can play either the original freeware game, or the Cave Story+, with 
enhanced graphics, sound and other features.
attr.inst:
Copy the game files into your ports/doukutsu-rs folder. You can use the original freeware Cave Story files, which can be found here: https://www.cavestory.org/download/cave-story.php

Or, you can buy Cave Story+ on Steam. This has higher-resolution graphics, remastered music and other enhancements.

The game uses the SDL controller by default, but controls can be reconfigured in the game.
attr.inst_md:
Copy the game files into your `ports/doukutsu-rs` folder. You can use the original freeware Cave Story files, which can be found here: [https://www.cavestory.org/download/cave-story.php](https://www.cavestory.org/download/cave-story.php)

Or, you can buy Cave Story+ on Steam. This has higher-resolution graphics, remastered music and other enhancements.

The game uses the SDL controller by default, but controls can be reconfigured in the game.
attr.title: Doukutsu-rs

attr.desc: Downwell is a curious game about a young person venturing down a well in search of untold treasures with only his Gunboots for protection. Make your way further and further down into the darkness filled with nasty creatures and mysterious secrets to collect the spectacular red gems scattered about the rocks. Step into precariously placed shops and buy some helpful items or level up between levels to battle well-dwelling monsters and uncover hidden caves filled with riches and relics. No two trips down the well are ever the same!
attr.inst:
Purchase and download the game from: https://store.steampowered.com/app/360740/Downwell/ OR  https://www.gog.com/en/game/downwell.
Locate your gamefolder and copy all the files from the folder to /ports/downwell/gamedata.
attr.title: Downwell

attr.desc: Death Rally is a vehicular combat racing video game developed by Remedy Entertainment, published by Apogee Software and distributed by GT Interactive.
attr.inst: The game needs the original assets, they are freely available. Download the DeathRallyWin\_10.exe from https://www.chip.de/downloads/Death-Rally-Vollversion\_38550689.html and place it into the ports/drally/ directory and it will be automatically extracted.
attr.title: dRally

attr.desc: Dr. Bloodshot is a short survival horror game. It's set in an old mansion filled with monsters that the player has to avoid (either by running away or by hiding in cabinets). The objective is to reach the well secured laboratory of Dr. Bloodshot, which can be done by sabotaging various power stations across the mansion.
attr.inst: Ready to Run
attr.title: Dr. Bloodshot

attr.desc: Drilbert the Drill Boy is back! Help Drilbert fulfill his dream of drilling as deep as he can! A little puzzle game where you dig + push. Dig Deep; collect loot; get out.
attr.inst:
You can download Drilbert II Diggeredoo for free at: https://wheybags.itch.io/drilbert-ii-diggeredoo 

Download the Drilbert_II_Diggeredoo.zip version and extract it. Within the extracted files, there's a folder named linux with an assets.zip file; extract the contents of assets.zip into the port's gamedata directory.
attr.inst_md:
You can download Drilbert II Diggeredoo for free at: https://wheybags.itch.io/drilbert-ii-diggeredoo 

Download the Drilbert\_II\_Diggeredoo.zip version and extract it. Within the extracted files, there's a folder named linux with an assets.zip file; extract the contents of assets.zip into the port's gamedata directory.
attr.title: Drilbert II Diggeredoo

attr.desc: A vertical arcade racing game where your vehicle is out of control. You must refrain from crashing into oncoming cars and see how many you can dodge.
attr.inst: Download the .exe and place it into the gamedata folder
attr.title: Drink'n'Drive

attr.desc: Jump your way up on a generated tower while a laser beam chases you from below. The higher you go, the faster it gets, and it isn't long before disappearing (and reappearing) platforms and spikes are introduced to make your life harder.
attr.inst:
You can purchase DROID7 at: https://juancolacelli.itch.io/droid7

Download any Windows or Linux version and extract it, and place the DROID7.pck file in the gamedata directory. This has been tested with Windows 64-bit, Dec 30 2022 release
attr.title: DROID7

attr.desc: Embark on a feathered adventure in Ducklings Maze, where you play as a courageous duck on a mission to rescue your adorable ducklings and lead them safely back home through a challenging maze. Inspired by the fairy tale "Den grimme aelling" by Hans Christian Andersen, the game is a medium/high difficulty maze with all the elements that an 80s arcade game requires.
attr.inst: Ready to run.
attr.title: Ducklings Maze

attr.desc: A video game that crosses the tried-and-true gameplay of Pong with the competitive frenzy of foosball. Billed as the world's first 'sportslike', tongue firmly planted in cheek.

attr.inst_md: Purchase the game at [https://heavy-element.itch.io/dudelings](https://heavy-element.itch.io/dudelings) -- download the Android version, place the apk in `dudelingsarcadesportsball/gamedata`

attr.desc: Duke Nukem 3D using the rednukem build open source port by Alexey Khokholov.

attr.desc: Duke Nukem 3D - Alien World Order is the fifth episode of Duke Nukem 3D. The fifth episode was added to the game as part of the 20th Anniversary Edition and contains eight levels, including one secret level. Levels in this episode are based in cities from around the world, including Amsterdam, Moscow, London, Giza, Paris, San Francisco, Hollywood, and Rome. The final boss is the Cycloid Incinerator.
attr.inst: Obtain game files from your Steam copy of Alien World Tour.  See '/duke3dawo/Place Duke3D AWT files here'  for instructions to place your Alien World Tour contents into the duke3dawo directory.
attr.title: Duke Nukem 3D - Alien World Order

attr.desc: Experience a clever take on retro Japanese puzzle games. Bite, blow up, and break through 80 charming but challenging levels. Crack each level's code and crush the evil Ghostlord. Be sure to make haste, though, or the Ghost minions will make waste ... of you!
attr.inst: Purchase the game on itch.io (https://programancer.itch.io/dumpy) or Steam (https://store.steampowered.com/app/1631500/Dumpy_and_Bumpy). First, extract the .zip (if itch.io version), then copy the game files to this port's gamedata folder.
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game on [itch.io](https://programancer.itch.io/dumpy) or [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/1631500/Dumpy_and_Bumpy). First, extract the *.zip* (if itch.io version), then copy the game files to this port's *gamedata* folder.

attr.desc: Dungeon Crawl Stone Soup is a game of dungeon exploration, combat and magic, involving characters of diverse skills, worshipping deities of great power and caprice. To win, you'll need to be a master of tactics and strategy, and prevail against overwhelming odds.

attr.desc: Dynamate is a puzzle game where the aim of the game, in any level, is to clear the level of the numbered / colored pieces. Pieces can be removed in a predefined way by moving another piece into them. There are also pieces affecting the currently moving piece. This is a port of the Playdate Version which was based on the gp2x version of the game.
attr.inst: Ready to run.

attr.desc:
Wizard roguelike
Traverse a dungeon and add a new spell each time you clear a floor.

Your spells cycle in a loop.

attr.desc:
"Dr. Darkglass" wants to Conquer the World, so he stole all the Energy supplies to create his Evil Robots. There is only one benign and that is "Elec Dude", he is the last Hope to save Mankind.
This Game is about collecting all the Energy per Level and there by getting to the next Level. But be careful not to collide with Enemy Robots.

Note: Only works with the steam version for now!

Itch: Download ElecDude.zip from https://misteryjay.itch.io/elec-dude-full and unzip the contents to /ports/elecdude/gamedata

Steam: Claim the game from steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1907980/Elec_Dude/

attr.desc: In a world enshrouded by darkness, deep inside a factory, the light of hope still shines. ElecHead has you play as Elec, a small robot on a mission to bring light back to the world. When Elec touches walls, floors, platforms, switches, and more, he makes electricity run through them, activating them. He can also detach and throw his head to trigger things remotely, but be careful: if he doesn't get his head back within ten seconds, he will shut down. Elec will have to use his head, literally and figuratively, to find a way out of this trap-ridden facility.
attr.inst:
Purchase the game from https://namatakahashi.itch.io/elechead or Steam or GOG.
Download the game and copy over the files to ports/elechead/gamedata.
attr.inst_md:
Purchase the game from https://namatakahashi.itch.io/elechead or Steam or GOG.
Download the game and copy over the files to ports/elechead/gamedata.

Tested with itch.io (ElecHead(Win1.0.5).zip,), Steam and GOG (GOG elechead 1.0.5.1)
attr.title: ElecHead

attr.desc: A 2D psychic noir point-and-click adventure where you play as Lady Tick Tock, a detective who speaks to the dead to solve a string of murders in a dystopian city. With EGA-inspired pixel art and a narrative-focused design free of arcade sequences or dead-ends, the game offers a gripping story you can explore at your own pace.

attr.desc_md:
E.Z is a simple hardcore platformer game the goal being get across to the other side of each of the 100 levels while each death throws you back to the previous levels.

With a semi-random level sequence, level variability and quick level swapping, E.Z is hard to get used to. It will bring a challenge to your skill, reaction, and adaptability.

attr.desc:
A great multiplayer game brought to you by [Ronnie Hedlund](https://sourceforge.net/u/rh_galaxy/profile/). The source code is available [here.](https://sourceforge.net/p/galaxyv2/code/HEAD/tree/)

A 2D multiplayer space shooter, inspired by the Amiga classic Gravity Force. Play race, mission or dogfight. Single player, with friends or against AI. There are 50+ levels and a map-editor included.

Global hi-score and achievements with replays on the website.

Features

    Space shooter
    Multiplayer
    Online hiscore
    Replays
    Race
    Dogfight
    Mission
    AI
    Editor
    Cross platform
attr.inst:
Start the program

Multiple instances of the game may be started on the same machine for testing.
The server (Server.exe) need only be run if you want a stand alone server.
Firewall ports

TCP port 1999 needs to be forwarded in your firewall/router to be able to host games and have other players join you.
Login as member

To use achievements and hiscores you need to create a user here.
Then login as that user, or select cancel to just play directly.
Connect to server

Enter the IP address or host name of a server and click "connect".
You can enter 127.0.0.1 to connect to your own server.
All games on that server will be shown.
You can join green games.
You can't join red games, they are full or already started.
If no game is shown you have to create a new game.
Join existing game

Enter your name and choose a green game from the list.
Click "Join".
Create new game

Enter your name, and the name of the game.
Click "New".
Start game

The player that created the game should set the level to play and make other settings before starting the game. This player will be the master.
Others that have joined can only chat until the game starts.

The master can kick players by selecting a player and press delete.
If the master leaves the game, mastership is transferred to another player.
attr.title: Galaxy Forces 2

attr.desc: Ion Fury using the EDuke32 source port.  Ion Fury is a prequel to Bombshell. Shelly "Bombshell" Harrison, a bomb disposal expert working for the Global Defense Force (GDF), returns as the game's protagonist, fighting against the cybernetic forces of Dr. Jadus Heskel.
attr.desc_md: Ion Fury using the EDuke32 source port.  Ion Fury is a prequel to Bombshell. Shelly "Bombshell" Harrison, a bomb disposal expert working for the Global Defense Force (GDF), returns as the game's protagonist, fighting against the cybernetic forces of Dr. Jadus Heskel. **Note: This supports up to v1.10 of Ion Fury!**
attr.inst: Purchase the game from Steam or GOG.  See instructions for obtaining v1.10 or earlier of Ion Fury from Steam or GOG.  Place the v1.10 (or earlier) game files fury.def, fury.grp, and fury.grpinfo into the ports/ionfury directory.  Ion Fury also works on lower-end devices such as with an RK3326 CPU, but with reduced performance.
attr.inst_md: Requires early version of Ion Fury v1.10 or older. Purchase the game from [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/562860/Ion_Fury/) OR [GOG](https://www.gog.com/en/game/ion_fury) **Steam**: Download/Install the game using the Steam Console by typing download_depot 562860 562861 189007903929408028, copy fury.def, fury.grp, and fury.grpinfo into ports/ionfury **GOG**: Download Version 1.10. Do this by first installing Ion Fury using GOG Galaxy, then go to More > Manage Installation > Configure > Uncheck auto-updates > Show more versions > Select Version 1.10. Copy fury.def, fury.grp, and fury.grpinfo into ports/ionfury.  Ion Fury also works on lower-end devices such as with an RK3326 CPU, but with reduced performance.
attr.title: Ion Fury

attr.desc: Jump Off The Bridge is a platformer with an emphasis on difficulty and unique level design. Each level, the player is required to jump off the bridge, but dying in any other sense, is failure. You may encounter characters that require items, methodical puzzle levels, intensely difficult platforming, tough levels that test your reaction time, and even bosses. Jump Off The Bridge is a meticulously crafted world that avoids the overuse of previously introduced sprites and characters. Every level feels unique, and is memorable.
attr.inst:
Purchase the game from steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1057780/Jump_Off_The_Bridge/
Download the game and from your Steam library,  right click on Jump Off The Bridge >  Manage > Browse local files. Copy the data.win, audiogroup2.dat and audiogroup3.dat from the assets folder to /ports/jumpoffthebridge/gamedata
attr.title: Jump Off The Bridge

attr.desc:
Ken's Labyrinth is a first-person shooter for MS-DOS published in 1993 by Epic MegaGames. It was programmed by Ken Silverman, who later designed the Build engine used for rendering in 3D Realms's Duke Nukem 3D (1996). 
 Ken's Labyrinth is about an ordinary man, heavily implied to be Ken Silverman himself, who wakes up one night to discover that his dog has been kidnapped by aliens. He tags along on their ship and ends up on their homeworld, where he must defeat the murderous creatures and rescue his beloved pet.

attr.desc: Spotify Connect uses Librespot which allows you to stream music to your handheld via Spotify Premium. It even works in the background, allowing you to play music, no matter what your doing on your handheld!
attr.inst:
This port is ready to run:
- Install "Spotify Connect" port.
- Open the port and toggle it on.
- Select your handheld in Spotify devices on your Desktop or phone.
- Close app if you want to play games. (L1 + R1)
- The app dynamically registers if Spotify is running, so if you want to turn it off,  just open the port again and use the toggle switch.
attr.inst_md:
This port is ready to run:
- Install "Spotify Connect" port.
- Open the port and toggle it on.
- Select your handheld in Spotify devices on your Desktop or phone.
- Close app if you want to play games. (L1 + R1)
- The app dynamically registers if Spotify is running, so if you want to turn it off,  just open the port again and use the toggle switch.

attr.desc:
Little Runmo - The Game, is a 2D platformer game originating from an animated Youtube film called "Little Runmo" made by the creator Gooseworx. The Story revolves around a fictional videogame character trying to survive with his last life.

The gameplay of Little Runmo - The Game, is based on the video but also takes inspiration from the Super Mario games. For fans that come from the animation, the game is not a 1 to 1 replica of the animated film. I am not trying to make this a hardcore Meatboy-type game, I want to introduce challenging moments but I will try to make the difficulty curve as smooth as possible.

The early game will be pretty chill, just imagine how the Mario games were designed, then newer harder mechanics get slowly introduced. Big inspirations again were Mario World and Super Mario Bros Wii and also a fan-game called Mario 63.

You'll need a specific release, which you can obtain using a tool like DepotDownloader (https://github.com/SteamRE/DepotDownloader). There are also GUIs for DepotDownloader, like https://depotdownloader.00pium.net. The command may vary depending on your system, but the `-app`, `-depot`, and `manifest` digits must match those below:

`./DepotDownloader -app 1404850 -depot 1404853 -manifest 5385995170406685945 -username <STEAM_USERNAME> -password <STEAM_PASSWORD>`

Once you've grabbed this, locate the *Luck be a Landlord.pck* file and place this in the port's *gamedata* folder.

attr.desc: "Moonlight Embedded is an open source client for Sunshine and NVIDIA GameStream for embedded Linux systems. Moonlight allows you to stream your full collection of games and applications from your PC to other devices to play them remotely". Now with a brand new custom-made launcher!"
attr.desc_md: *"Moonlight Embedded is an open source client for [Sunshine](https://github.com/LizardByte/Sunshine) and NVIDIA GameStream for embedded Linux systems. Moonlight allows you to stream your full collection of games and applications from your PC to other devices to play them remotely"* Now with a brand new custom-made launcher!"
attr.inst: Install the latest version of Sunshine on your PC and use the launcher to pair to your pc. Full instructions are on the PortMaster site!
attr.inst_md:
- Install the latest version of [Sunshine](https://github.com/LizardByte/Sunshine/releases) on your PC *(GFE is not updated anymore but may give good results for NVIDIA users)*
- This guide will use the windows installer version. 
- Run the installer, agree with the terms. Wait for it to finish.
- Open Sunshine for the first time. It will open up a window in your default browser.
- It may give a warning about your connection not being private. Click on advanced and continue to localhost.
- Here you will set the username and password for Sunshine, set it to something simple and memorable. It will ask for it every time.
- The page will reload and then you will log into Sunshine. 
- Now its time to open Moonlight on your handheld. 
- First head to the *"Settings Menu"* and set them how you would like. Preferably start off with a low bitrate and your devices native resolution and framerate. 
- Lets move to the *"Connect Menu"*. Here you will first set your host device IP-address. 
- You will be able to find this by going to your network settings, properties and under *"IPv4 address"*.
- Now its time to pair. Head to the *"Pin"* section on your host PC. 
- Click *"Pair"* in the Moonlight port. This will now show a pin. Fill this pin into Sunshine. Also fill in the device name, this can be named after your device such a *"RG35XX"*. 
- After sending the signal on you host PC, you will receive a message *"Succesfully paired"* in the moonlight app on your handheld. 
- Head over to the *"Reload Apps"* function on your handheld. Click on it and you will see the currently configured apps from Sunshine. Every time you update the Apps in Sunshine, use this function.
- Head to the *"Play Menu"* and select the app you want to stream, Steam for example. 
- The Moonlight app will close on your handheld and it will start streaming. Wait 5 seconds for the controls.
- Have fun!

## Recommendations: ##
- Moonlight requires a very good internet connection to get a decent experience. There are many factors at play such a the detail of the game your running. Simpler 2d games are easier to stream and require less power to decode on your handheld. You will have to try and find a balance of bitrate and framerate for your setup. 
- Experiencing input and/or audio delay? Lower the bitrate, resolution, or framerate. Reconnecting may help random desyncing issues.
- Moonlight will maintain aspect ratio of your host PC monitor. You can get a better picture by manually changing the resolution to your devices native resolution, such as 640x480. There are ways to automate this process, such as  [ResolutionAutomation](https://github.com/Nonary/ResolutionAutomation). Use these programs on your own risk.
- Inputs may be reversed. Mouse mode does not work on Moonlight-Embedded. Both can be resolved by using SteamInput.
- Its recommended to check your connection before streaming, use the pair function for this. Does it say *"Already paired"*, then youre good to go. It may also say something like *"App already opened"*, you need to use *"Force Close"* under the troubleshooting options in Sunshine.
- Most important of all, dont expect an amazing experience going in. These handhelds are not ideal for Streaming, even though they may seem like it.
attr.title: Moonlight New

Nidhogg is the epic award-winning fencing tug-of-war, full of graceful acrobatics and clumsy stabs. IRL yelling and excitement may occur, in this ultimate two-player showdown of fast-paced fencing and melee attacks.
The combat arena stretches in both directions, although besting an opponent only gains you ground. Matches aren’t won or lost with a single kill, but with a series of kills granting you right-of-way to run/fight/flee to your own goal-zone.
Each arena holds different strategic formations and chokepoints to use to your advantage. Until you reach your goal-zone, anything is possible. Only one thing is certain in Nidhogg… the only way to win is to outwit your opponent. En Garde!

Note: Only single player available for this port!

attr.desc:
OpenTyrian2000 is an open-source port of the DOS game Tyrian. It is a fork of OpenTyrian, with the end goal being to replicate the experience of Tyrian 2000 as closely as possible.

Tyrian is an arcade-style vertical scrolling shooter.  The story is set in 20,031 where you play as Trent Hawkins, a skilled fighter-pilot employed to fight MicroSol and save the galaxy.

Tyrian features a story mode, one- and two-player arcade modes, and networked multiplayer.
attr.desc_md:
**OpenTyrian2000** is an *open-source port* of the DOS game Tyrian. It is a fork of OpenTyrian, with the end goal being to replicate the experience of Tyrian 2000 as closely as possible.

**Tyrian** is an arcade-style vertical scrolling shooter.  The story is set in 20,031 where you play as *Trent Hawkins*, a skilled fighter-pilot employed to fight *MicroSol* and save the galaxy.

Tyrian features a story mode, one and two-player arcade modes, and networked multiplayer.
attr.inst: OpenTyrian2000 requires the Tyrian 2000 data files, which have been released as freeware (https://www.camanis.net/tyrian/tyrian2000.zip). Alternatively, the game is also available free of charge on GOG (https://www.gog.com/en/game/tyrian_2000). Game data is placed in the 'tyrian2000' subdirectory.
attr.inst_md: **OpenTyrian2000** uses the **Tyrian 2000** data files, which have been [**released as freeware**](https://www.camanis.net/tyrian/tyrian2000.zip). Alternatively, the game is also available *free of charge* on [**GOG**](https://www.gog.com/en/game/tyrian_2000). Game data is placed in the `gamedata` subdirectory.
attr.title: Open Tyrian 2000

attr.desc: The sinister Ravenous and his legions of brutal demons are poised for battle. The situation is dire, but humanity has one final ace in the hole: the Panzer Paladin!
attr.inst: Copy all the files from your Steam Windows copy of the game to `/roms/ports/panzerpaladin/gamedata`. PanzerPaladin.exe, a bunch of dll files and the Content folder should be directly inside of gamedata

attr.desc: PARSEC47 is a retromodern hi-speed shoot 'em up where you get to defeat retro enemies modernly. The player must destroy enemies while avoiding their projectiles and collecting green clusters of boxes for points.
attr.inst:
Select the stage by a keyboard or a joystick.
Press a shot key to start the game.
All stages are endless and created randomly each time.
The game continues until you lose all ships.

Control your ship and destroy enemies.
While holding a slow key, the ship becomes slow.
attr.title: PARSEC47

attr.desc:
Passage is a five-minute experimental art game that metaphorically represents an entire human lifetime, allowing players to navigate a pixelated world while exploring themes of love, aging, and mortality.

The game only lasts 5 minutes. If you don't get the point at first, please keep playing.
attr.inst: Ready to run!
attr.title: Passage

attr.desc: What do ducks have to do with rabbits? Exactly, adventure and physics stuff are what you are looking for.

Pingus is a free clone of the popular Lemmings game.
Your goal is to guide a horde of penguins through a world full of obstacles and penguin traps to safety. Although penguins (unlike lemmings) are rather smart, they sometimes lack the necessary overview and now rely on you to save them.

attr.desc: Plumbers Don't Wear Ties is an adult-oriented "romantic comedy" visual novel/dating sim developed by United Pixtures and published by Kirin Entertainment for the 3DO Interactive Multiplayer. Although the game did have a Microsoft Windows version, it had very limited distribution and was published by United Pixtures itself. The game stars Edward J. Foster and Jeanne Basone as John and Jane, respectively; two people who are being pressured by their respective parents to go out and find a spouse. The player's task is to get John and Jane together.

A GameBoy themed reimplementation of Tiny Tactics

attr.desc:
It looks like the penguin is having a bad day. Flaming thugs have cut off your nap and now are destroying the silent cave.

Help the penguin to end the party before things get too hot!

 

HOW TO PLAY

Eliminate all invaders using your egg bomb, but beware of hot areas as you will have difficulty moving through them.

You can restore the ice using your snotty sneeze. It will undo the heat and can also block enemies.

In case you end up getting stuck, sneeze over a block to break it. Use the bomb timer to your advantage.. also it is possible to push it forward in order to make a surprise attack!
attr.inst: READY to RUN
attr.title: Pepper Pengui

This game now use stb_image for Image Loading.

attr.desc: Sling yourself through the air by catching flies with your tongue. Eating several things without touching the ground will score you a combo, so try to stay in the air for as long as you can! The timer constantly ticks down; you can eat anything to keep it going a little longer, but watch out for ghosts which are lethal to the touch! You can stop bombs from exploding by eating them before they hit the water.
attr.inst: Ready to run!
attr.title: Pullywog

attr.desc:
Pulstario is a small game in which you pilot a ship through the void and collect missing souls. It has challenging moments and hopefully the gameplay is a rewarding experience. From the creator of LOVE and kuso.

Pulstario is a short game that will likely take a player 30 minutes to complete the main game. There are also achievements, secret levels, and unlockable ship skins for the player to earn and collect.

The gameplay for Pulstario has been described as:

"Wobbly Free Range Pac-Man"
"Lunar Lander - Without the landing"
"Asteroids with gravity"
"Luftrausers for Pacifists"
attr.inst:
Purchase and download Pulstario_Linux_DRMFree_V001.zip OR Pulstario_Windows_DRMFree_V001.zip from https://thatsmytrunks.itch.io/pulstario.
Copy all the files (game.unx/data.win, options.ini) from /assets or the zip into the pulstario/gamedata folder
attr.title: Pulstario

attr.desc:
PuPaiPo Space is a colorful space shoot-em-up in which you travel from Stage to Stage in search of the legendary space pizza. Piloting your trusty spaceship, you will have to battle waves of opponents, dodge hundreds of bullets, pick sweet power ups and face powerful bosses!

Travel through 7 different stages. Jumping from one stage to another requires your space jumping engine to recharge for roughly 90 seconds. During that time you will have to defend yourself from all the opponents in the area and defeat its boss.
attr.inst:
Purchase the game from https://bolhut.itch.io/pupaipo-space-deluxe or from https://store.steampowered.com/app/1148500/PuPaiPo_Space_Deluxe/

Itch:
Download PuPaiPo Space DX - Linux and copy the game.unx from the assets folder to /ports/pupaipospacedx/gamedata

Steam:
Run steam console via Windows+R: Type: steam://open/console, download the linux version by typing: download_depot 1148500 1148502 in the console, when the download is complete, it will tell you the location of the folder,  copy the game.unx from the assets folder to /ports/pupaipospacedx/gamedata
attr.title: PuPaiPo Space Deluxe

attr.desc: Base has been attacked and you are the last hope of saving Pure Metal. Shoot down hoards of enemies and unforgiving bosses in classic shooter style. Touch controls feature smooth analog from the onscreen D-pad. Use the arrow keys and the z and x buttons to shoot the enemy with the keyboard. You have one life to make it through each level, but don't worry your ship can take 3 consecutive hits before being destroyed. Also your ship will regenerate to full power if you can manage to avoid enemy fire long enough. Bob and weave your way through the enemy fire and kill every thing in site. This game is designed to brutally come after you but pay attention and look for the patterns and avoid the onslaught of bullets.
attr.inst: Just copy the game.win or data.win inside the gamedata folder. Windows store version works too.

You will need the original files of the PC/DOS/Amiga version copied to ports/reminiscence/gamedata folder.

- Steam or GOG data files can be found in `Flashback_Data/StreamingAssets/data`, copy these files into the `ports/reminiscence/gamedata` folder.
- Amiga audio files (optional) can be copied into the `ports/reminiscence/music` folder, but the files must be named `filename.mod` format. Some sources come with files named `mod.flashback-filename`, which will need to be renamed. e.g. `mod.flashback-chute -> chute.mod`
- voice.vce file (optional) for voice acting in cutscenes should be placed in `ports/reminiscence/gamedata` folder.
attr.title: Reminiscence

attr.desc: The Legend of Sword and Fairy, is a Chinese language fantasy video game series and media franchise centered on a series of nine Chinese mythology/xianxia-themed adventure role-playing computer games created by Yao Zhuangxian.​
attr.desc_md: The Legend of Sword and Fairy (Chinese: 仙劍奇俠傳; pinyin: Xiānjiàn Qíxiá Zhuàn), also known as Sword and Fairy (仙劍) or Chinese Paladin, is a Chinese language fantasy video game series and media franchise centered on a series of nine Chinese mythology/xianxia-themed adventure role-playing computer games created by Yao Zhuangxian. The eponymous first game in the series is released for MS-DOS CLI in 1995 by the 'Crazy Boyz' team (狂徒創作群) of the Taiwanese game developing and publishing company Softstar Entertainment (大宇資訊). It is one of the so-called 'Twin Swords of Softstar' (大宇雙劍) along with the sister Xuan-Yuan Sword series, and has been widely regarded as one of the (if not the) most iconic Chinese RPG series ever made.​
attr.inst: Purchase the game from Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1546570/Sword_and_Fairy/ and put all files into the sdlpal/gamedata folder. Add the english translation into the sdlpal/gamedata from: https://www.romhacking.net/translations/2441/. If you want to play in other language, modify the variable 'MessageFileName' at the file sdlpal/sdlpal.cfg with the one you want or empty for original language.
attr.title: The Legend of Sword and Fairy

Download the game from your Steam library. Right-click on Skeleton Boomerang > Manage > Browse local files. Copy all the files from the folder to /ports/skeletonboomerang/gamedata

**Prevamped version (better performance):**
From your Steam library, right-click Skeleton Boomerang and select Properties. Go to Betas and select "prevamped - The pre-reVamped build of the game." Download and install the prevamped version. Copy all the files from the folder to /ports/skeletonboomerang/gamedata.

attr.desc: Get ready for a wild ride with Super Meat Boy! This tough as nails platform game is the brainchild of the dynamic duo, Edmund McMillen and Tommy Refenes, also known as 'Team Meat'. Born from the success of their 2008 Flash game, 'Meat Boy', this game promises thrills, spills, and maybe a few broken controllers. Are you up for the challenge?
attr.inst:
Let's get Super Meat Boy up and running! First, you'll need to copy the Steam version of Super Meat Boy (for Linux) game files to the ports/supermeatboy/gamedata directory. Easy peasy, right?

If you're a Windows user, don't worry, we've got you covered! Open your Steam console, and run this:

download_depot 40800 40802 6556596646716197166 .

Got the Humble version? No problemo! Just place your supermeatboy-linux-11112013-bin file in the ports/supermeatboy/gamedata directory and watch as it extracts the needed files on its first run. Now, let's get gaming!
attr.title: Super Meat Boy

Miss Undefined has been whisked away by the dastardly Kill Screen. Go from Zero to Hero in this fast-paced platformer, chasing time, the high score, and eventually the Kill Screen itself.

Super Mega Zero is a tight precision and puzzle platformer with shoot 'em up elements. Simply touch an upgrade and switch forms to go from classic, straight-forward platforming to the more puzzle-like action number system or Shoot' Em Up gameplay.

Note: Poor readability on small screens and options menu does not work

attr.inst: All files included and ready to run. Thanks to Fenrir-Lunaris for releasing this fantastic game to the Public Domain.
attr.inst_md: All files included and ready to run. Thanks to [Fenrir-Lunaris](https://fenrir-lunaris.itch.io/vikings-of-midgard) for releasing this fantastic game to the Public Domain.

attr.desc: An infinite wave-based shoot-em-up with a unique dash mechanic. Blast away at deadly viruses, mechanical hybrids, and two unique bosses. Dash through bullets, lasers, and enemies to stay alive and score!
attr.inst:
You can purchase Viral Reload at: https://retrocademedia.itch.io/viral-reload 

Download the Linux version and extract it, and place the Viral Reload.pck file in the gamedata directory. This has been tested with the Viral Reload Linux.zip, Jan 26 2022 release.
attr.title: Viral Reload

attr.desc: A snake game with smooth rotation made for the PS Vita with LibVita2D. Turn left and right to collect as many apples as you can, but avoid biting your tail, or you will lose the game.
attr.inst: Ready to run !
attr.title: vitaSnake

attr.desc: VNDS-LOVE allows you to play such famous games as Tsukihime, Fate \ Stay night, Ever 17, Saya no Uta and many others.
attr.inst:
Check VNDS Wiki "https://github.com/BASLQC/vnds/wiki" to find VNDS ready novels. Place your novel folder into ./vnds-love/conf/love/VNDS-LOVE/novels/  
More info in README.
attr.title: VNDS Novel Reader

attr.desc: Vodovod is a game similar to Pipe Mania and Pipe Dream, in which you have to lead the water from the house to the storage tank. You get a limited number of pipes on each level and need to combine them to lead the water from the house at the top of the screen to the storage tank at the bottom.
attr.inst: Ready to run!
attr.title: Vodovod

attr.desc: A low-res, retro point-and-click adventure game where an experiment has gone unpredictably wrong. Your daughter is whooshed through a tear in space! Embrace the void and follow her. The only way to bring her back.
attr.inst: Purchase the game at itch.io (https://cosmicvoid.itch.io/void-breach), grab the Windows version (Void Breach.rar), extract and and copy the game files into voidbreach/gamedata folder.
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game at [itch.io](https://cosmicvoid.itch.io/void-breach), grab the Windows version (*Void Breach.rar*), extract and and copy the game files into `voidbreach/gamedata` folder.
attr.title: Void Breach

attr.desc: A post-apocalyptic RPG set in the space-faring Egyptian empire. In the far future, the maniacal Prime Pharaoh rules the wastelands of Earth. Any who oppose him are exiled to the Void Pyramid. This outer space prison is populated by criminals, beasts, and mutants.
attr.inst: Download the Windows version of the game (for free) here: https://willyelektrix.itch.io/void-pyramid -- extract it, and copy the voidpyramid.rpg file to the port folder.
attr.inst_md: Download the Windows version of the game (for free) here: [https://willyelektrix.itch.io/void-pyramid](https://willyelektrix.itch.io/void-pyramid) -- extract it, and copy the *voidpyramid.rpg* file to the port folder.
attr.title: Void Pyramid

attr.desc: A sokoban-style puzzle adventure. Traverse a forgotten labyrinth in search of your memories. Do you remember why you are here?
attr.desc_md:
*Void Stranger* is a 2D sokoban-style puzzle game where every step counts. Descend into the forgotten labyrinth teeming with fiendish foes and traps that defy reason. A swift defeat lurks at every corner for those who neither study their surroundings nor think their moves through with care.
Trust you wits and slowly, surely, you will conquer the mysteries before you.

You do remember why you are here, right? Or have you lost something? Something very important to you.
attr.inst: Place game .png, .dat, .csv, and .win files in the "gamedata" folder. Game must be v1.1.1, Steam or Itch supported. The game will take 3-5 minutes to boot for the first time only.
attr.inst_md:
Purchase the game via [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/2121980/Void_Stranger/) or [Itch](https://system-erasure.itch.io/void-stranger).
Currently supporting v1.1.1 off Steam and Itch.
Place all `.png`, `.dat`, `.csv`, and `.win` files in the `gamedata` folder.
The game will take 3-5 minutes to boot for the first time only.
attr.title: Void Stranger

attr.desc: Vortexion is a MSX/SG-1000 inspired shoot-em-up written in Python and uses the Pyxel game engine.
attr.desc_md: Vortexion is a MSX/SG-1000 inspired shoot-em-up written in Python and uses the Pyxel game engine.

attr.inst_md: Ready to run !

attr.desc: VVVVVV is a 2010 puzzle-platform game created by Terry Cavanagh.
attr.inst: This port is Ready to Run, and includes all retail levels.

File structure:

/roms/ports/wakingmars/gamedata/wakingmars.png

attr.desc: Make some friends, eat some burgers, and unearth terrible secrets from the depths of space. Frog and Toad meet Cosmic Horror. A turn-based RPG with a kind-hearted doofus trying to make tough times a little easier.
attr.inst: Purchase the game from https://super-walrus-games.itch.io/walthros-renewal and download the Windows version (Linux should work fine, too). Alternatively, you could play the DEMO version (also on the itch page) -- but rename the walthrosDEMO.rpg file to walthrosrenewal.rpg
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game from [https://super-walrus-games.itch.io/walthros-renewal](https://super-walrus-games.itch.io/walthros-renewal) and download the Windows version (Linux should work fine, too). attr.desc: Waternet is a puzzle game where you to connect pipes to each other so that water flows through it.
attr.inst: All files included!
attr.title: Waternet

attr.desc: A port of QuickBasic 4.5 game Wetspot 2 by Angelo Mottola.
attr.inst: Just download and play.
attr.title: Wetspot 2

attr.desc:
A real-time build-up strategy game
You are the regent of a small clan. Your task is to build an ever growing settlement. Every member of your clan will do his or her part to produce more resources to further this growth.

Widelands offers a single-player mode with campaigns that tell stories of the tribes and their struggle in the Widelands universe. However, settling really starts when you unite with friends over the Internet or LAN to build up new empires together – or to crush each other in the dusts of war. Widelands also offers an artificial intelligence to challenge you.
attr.inst:
All game files included, optional Mods can be installed at will.
Main Menu Windows can be dragged if screen is too small.
attr.title: Widelands

attr.desc:
A unique platformer where an evil AI predicts your movement. Dodge AI-spawned traps, solve optional puzzles and uncover the dark secrets of the simulation. 
A lot of levels in Will You Snail are relatively empty by default. The challenge comes from the interactions with the evil AI. You will jump, run, dodge and die. This game is precise, fast-paced and challenging. (Stay cool, you can change the difficulty at any time.)
attr.inst: Purchase the game from Steam. Use the Steam console to download the right version of the game: download_depot 1115050 1115051 8411373960038250729. Place all the files from /depot_1115051 into ports/willyousnail/assets
attr.inst_md:
Purchase the game from [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/1115050/Will_You_Snail/).
Use download_depot 1115050 1115051 8411373960038250729 with Steam Console to download the game and add the data to willyousnail/assets.
attr.title: Will You Snail

attr.desc:
2D retro pacman like arcade game

Collect all the treasure in the dungeon!  Can you make it to the second level? 
Leave your highest score in the comments.  Good luck!
attr.inst: Ready to run.
attr.title: Wizardchase

attr.desc: A challenging little puzzle-platformer game where platforms appear and disappear each time you leap.
attr.inst: You can download Wizard Orb for free at: https://slimewitch.itch.io/wizard-orb. Download the *windows.zip* version and extract it, and place the *index.pck* file in the gamedata directory.
attr.title: Wizard Orb

attr.desc: Wizznic! is an open-source, freeware remake of Puzznic, recreating the original arcade levels, the NES ones and including fan-made puzzle packs with new custom levels. The gameplay remains exactly the same, where the player has to move individual tiles, arranging them inside a restricted space to create groups of identical blocks and make all disappear by touching each other. Elevators and other features gradually start to appear on later levels.
attr.inst: All files are included and game is ready to play
attr.title: Wizznic

attr.desc:
LZ Wolf and EZ Wolf come to PortMaster! A Love2D launcher makes selecting games and mods easy. See the readme for instructions and details.

Includes shareware demo files.
attr.inst: Comes with shareware files for Wolfenstein 3D and Spear of Destiny. Add your full game files to their respective folders to play.
attr.title: Wolfenstein 3D

attr.desc:
Wordle SDL is a port of a clone of Wordle made with SDL.

Wordle is a web-based word game created and developed by Welsh software engineer Josh Wardle, and owned and published by The New York Times Company since 2022. Players have six attempts to guess a five-letter word, with feedback given for each guess in the form of colored tiles indicating when letters match or occupy the correct position.
attr.inst: All files are included and ready.
attr.title: Wordle SDL

attr.desc: Guess the five letter word within six attempts! Thousands of words to guess! Features 24 different color palettes and 8 background options.
attr.inst: This game is ready to run. Special thanks to Fred Wood for allowing PortMaster to distribute the game!
attr.title: Words With Freds

attr.desc: World War 2 GI using the rednukem build open source port by Alexey Khokholov.
attr.inst: You'll need to add your own full version WW2GI.GRP and WW2DI.RTS and .CON files and optionally CD audio tracks as OGG file in the format trackXX.ogg (where XX is the track number) to the ports/rednukem-WWII/gamedata folder.
attr.title: World War II GI

attr.desc: World of Goo is a multiple award winning physics based puzzle / construction game made entirely by two guys. Drag and drop living, squirming, talking, globs of goo to build structures, bridges, cannonballs, zeppelins, and giant tongues. The millions of Goo Balls that live in the beautiful World of Goo are curious to explore - but they don't know that they are in a game, or that they are extremely delicious.
attr.inst: Copy your GOG World of Goo .sh into the Port folder or copy your Linux Game files (WorldOfGoo.bin.x86_64 renamed to WorldOfGoo.bin and GameFolder) to the worldofgoo gamedata folder.
attr.title: World of Goo

attr.desc: Worship Vector is a Tower Defense type game. The game is based upon a unique map, which extends automatically.
attr.inst: Just download and play.
attr.title: Worship Vector

attr.desc: Play as an exiled 'wum' looking for a new home in this bizarre but charming world, filled with strange creatures, puzzles, monsters and political chaos.
attr.inst: Install portfiles. Buy Wuppo on Steam. Right-click on Wuppo, select Properties, go to Betas, select 'Revert' (For MacOS version, make 'Revert' thick). Right-click on Wuppo again, go to Manage, then 'Browse Local Files.' Copy everything except the Funpack and Soundtrack folders. Go to your ROMs SD card, locate the 'ports/wuppo/assets' folder, and paste it there.
attr.inst_md:
1. Install portfiles. Buy Wuppo on Steam.
2. Right-click on Wuppo and select **Properties**.
3. Go to **Betas**, select **Beta Participation**, and choose **Revert** (For MacOS version, make **Revert** thick).
4. Right-click on Wuppo again, go to **Manage**, and select **Browse Local Files**.
5. Copy everything except for the **Funpack** and **Soundtrack** folders.
6. Go to your **ROMs SD card**, locate the `ports/wuppo/assets` folder, and paste the files there.
attr.title: Wuppo

attr.desc: Xeno Fighters R is an in-development shmup fangame inspired by the Raiden Fighters series by Seibu Kaihatsu. The game has four original fighters: the Amada Vipros, the Phyxius, the Zaiva, and the Xelcor. It also features guest fighters from other shoot 'em up games by Psikyo, Capcom, Konami, and others. There are 20 stages to play in the game with four different game modes to select from.
attr.inst: Ready to run.
attr.title: Xeno Fighters R

attr.desc: Xenon Valkyrie is a rogue-like with many RPG elements in which you will have to get to the deepest part of a moon and finish the plans of a wicked witch. You will be able to get many weapons randomly as you fight in a world that is created every time you play.
attr.inst:
Download the game from https://store.steampowered.com/app/573780/Xenon_Valkyrie/,
copy copy data.win, all .ogg and .ini files to /ports/xenonvalkyrie/gamedata
attr.title: Xenon Valkyrie

attr.desc: It's your summer vacation on Xoo Island! This beautiful, deserted island is populated by a surreal menagerie of alien creatures. Can you find them all? While you're at it, you might as well collect a bunch of fossils, gems, eggs, merit badges, video games, and anything else that isn't nailed down. Xoo: Xeno Xafari is a new style of collecting RPG.
attr.inst:
Paid (new/sequel) version

1.Purchase and download from: https://willyelektrix.itch.io/xoo-xeno-xafari
2. Extract, and copy xoo.rpg to the xooxenoxafari port folder

Free (old) version

1. Download from: https://willyelektrix.itch.io/1999megallennium
2. Extract, and copy megadata/xeno.rpg to the xooxenoxafari port folder
attr.inst_md:
**Paid (new/sequel) version**

2. Extract, and copy `xoo.rpg` to the `xooxenoxafari` port folder

**Free (old) version**

1. Download from: [https://willyelektrix.itch.io/1999megallennium](https://willyelektrix.itch.io/1999megallennium)
2. Extract, and copy `megadata/xeno.rpg` to the `xooxenoxafari` port folder
attr.title: Xoo: Xeno Xafari

attr.desc: Xye is a puzzle game in which the objective is to help a character that looks like a green circle to get all the gems in the room. This is, of course, not as easy as it sounds; Xye must solve all sorts of puzzles while at the same time avoiding all sorts of traps and beasts. Xye is similar to other puzzle games like Sokoban or Boulder Dash, yet it also includes some arcade elements. Xye is a derivative of a classic Windows game called Kye, which is the base of the gameplay experience and visual elements. Xye is able to play level files that were made for Kye and Sokoban.
attr.inst: Ready to Run
attr.title: Xye

attr.desc: You’ve come on the night of the hunt. The streets of this cursed, gothic town are overrun with beasts, and what has become of the men who tried to hunt them before. Explore the twisting roads, go toe to toe with powerful foes, and uncover Yarntown’s dark secrets.
attr.inst: Download game from https://solarus-games.org/games/yarntown/ and put the .solarus file in ports/yarntown.
attr.title: Yarntown

attr.desc:
YATKA is one of many Tetris implementations available. Motivation behind this one was, on the one hand, to create a game that would conform to modern rules of the game, while, on the other, to make possible running it on resource-limited platforms (e.g. Bittboy or JZ4760-based handheld consoles).
Two Classic themes by Tekkenfede included.
attr.inst: All file included, boot the game and play
attr.title: Yatka

attr.desc: Y E L L O W - J A C K E T (or just yellow jacket) is a vaporwave arcade shoot-em-up about a motorcyclist running from the government in this classic 80s style arcade shmup! Can you get the highest score?
attr.inst: Download the game on itch.io page and retrieve the file data.win from the Y E L L O W - J A C K E T.zip. After, data.win needs to be place on to the folder ports/yellowjacket/gamedata.
attr.title: Y E L L O W - J A C K E T

attr.desc: A cute Tamagotchi idle game from 14 Hours Productions.
attr.inst: Purchase game from Steam, rename the main .pck to "yolkheroes.pck" and add to the yolkheroes/gamedata/ directory. See https://portmaster.games/gptokeyb-documentation.html for details about Keyboard Text Entry.
attr.title: Yolk Heroes: A Long Tamago

attr.desc:
You Died ... but a Necromancer revived you! And will keep bringing you back to their crazy tower of death until you reach the top floor and get rid of them, allowing you to finally be free...
Can you stop this madness?
Or will you give up?
Reaching the top is no easy feat!
attr.inst:
Purchase the game from https://bolhut.itch.io/you-died-but-a-necromancer-revived-you OR https://store.steampowered.com/app/1037100/You_Died_but_a_Necromancer_revived_you/

Steam:
Run steam console via Windows+R: Type: steam://open/console, download the linux version by typing: download_depot 1037100 1037102 in the console, when the download is complete, it will tell you the location of the folder,  copy the game.unx from the assets folder to /ports/youdiedbanry/gamedata

Itch:
Download YouDied_BaNRY_linux.zip an copy the game.unx from the assets folder to /ports/youdiedbanry/gamedata
attr.title: You Died But a Necromancer Revived You

items: You Died But a Necromancer Revived You.sh
youdiedbanry.zip.name: youdiedbanry.zip

attr.desc:
You Have 10 Seconds is a fast paced arcade platformer where you’re spawned into a level and given ten seconds to work out how to reach the exit without dying before time runs out.

There are 25 Areas which each introduce a new mechanic to the gameplay, eventually creating extremely complex and difficult levels. Master collecting keys, swimming through acid, dodging motion sensors, time traveling, swapping dimensions, and so much more to clear areas as quickly as possible.
attr.inst:
Claim the game from: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2390510/You_Have_10_Seconds_2023/
Download the game and copy all the game files from /You Have 10 Seconds (2023) into youhave10s2023/gamedata
attr.title: You Have 10 Seconds (2023)
